item.title: Install Cloudstack 3.0.0 on Ubuntu 10.04 Server
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: Cloudstack 3.0.0 was release on Febrary 28th 2012. At the time I was trying to install version 2.2 on a VM. I was having a lot of trouble so seeing a new version was wonderful. The following is what I had to do in order to get the system setup. Hopfully this post will help you get Cloudstack running in your environment.
